physicalTable.name: SAMP_TARGETS_F
physicalTable.description: Targets fact table. Stores the target facts information at Month, Office and Product grain.

physicalColumns.name: Revenue
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores the target revenue information as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Prod_Key
physicalColumns.description: Product Key: Joins to Prod_Key of Products dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Office_Key
physicalColumns.description: Office Key: Joins to te Office_Key of Offices dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Units
physicalColumns.description: Units: Stores the target units information as an integer.

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Qtr_Key
physicalColumns.description: Bill Quarter Key: Joins to Qtr_Key of Time dimension table (Qtr grain).

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Mth_Key
physicalColumns.description: Bill Month Key: Joins the Mth_Key of Time dimension table (Mth grain).
